channel.title: Please help! commands disconect people
channel.description: Please help me. I've been trying to get my commands to work and they won't. Everytime me or anyone tries to use any command, they get disconnected. Here is what it shows. [code]Please help me. I've been trying to get my commands to work and they won't. Everytime me or anyone tries to use any command, they get disconnected. Here is what it shows. Code: [Select]Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from John.java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -6 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:10775) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20418) at client.packetProcess(client.java:22430) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)ClientHandler: Client John disconnected (localhost)Connection from localhost:1132[client-1-John]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms][code][/code]

item.title: Please help! commands disconect people

Please help me. I’ve been trying to get my commands to work and they won’t. Everytime me or anyone tries to use any command, they get disconnected. Here is what it shows.
